documents.document: This Mayweather/McGregor pish is becoming more of a farce by the day. A pure cringe fest
#fuckthe12th
Santa Ponsa couldn't get anymore fenian if it tried, fucking adore the place 🇮🇪🍀 #fuckthetwelfth
Can't remember the last time I was this excited for a festival! @Carl_Cox to kick it off, in 35 degree heat! Doesn't get any better 😏 #KFF17
@Smeitz1 Here, we're staying literally on the same street as that hotel 😂. No where near London funnily enough
Came to Turin worried about everything being expensive, just got 2 pizzas and a massive carryout for €16 😳😂
RT @gordonduncan7: Gers fans will enjoy Dave King not holding back in that statement. Quite a change of stance since 2012 though. https://t…
@chrislammie Know the feeling 😂😂
@chrislammie It's brilliant man. I've tanned about 10 magners and 4 bacon rolls this morning 😂. Would have cost about £60/70 in weatherspoons
@Ryanstevenson67 Cannot believe it's took me as long to finally go, fucking steal for £24
Never again will I come to Edinburgh airport and no book the lounge, save an absolute fortune
Miller & Carter tonight, no work for 2 weeks and on holiday the mora 😏. Some Thursday this! Roll on @KFuturFestival this weekend 🙌🔊
RT @rangerstaxcase: Let there be no spinning or euphemisms. The Supreme Court has ruled Rangers FC engaged in an illegal tax scheme 2002-20…
Feels good to finally see them outed as the cheating bastards we always knew they were #StripTheTitles
RT @alextomo: The scale of Rangers' cheating: £48m paid to 80 people over 10 years to unfairly win 14 trophies
RT @alextomo: 10 years of cheating the taxman to 14 trophies and all in the watch of Stewart Regan and Neil Doncaster at SFA/SPFL
RT @alextomo: This now means that Rangers cheated their way to 14 trophies: they cheated the taxman, they cheated us all.
RT @paddypower: Sod it - we're paying out on Celtic winning next season's Scottish Premiership title. #YouBeauty
RT @paddypower: This is the most embarrassing night for Rangers football club since they stopped being Rangers football club.
We've had some sensational laughs the last 6 or so years, but this is fucking up there 😂😂😂
Always next year eh 🙄🙄🙄
Fucking hell man 😂😂😂😂😂
"Kill All Taigs"🤔🤔. If we had a banner up "Kill All Huns", would it be branded culture? Or is it only allowed on bonfires? Asking for a mate https://t.co/g38YO0ytvk
Another diddy team that comes to Celtic Park with zero intention of winning and escapes with a point. Anti football backwater this country
Now it's finally all booked, can finally look forward to Munich! Bierhalles galore 🙌
@Ryanstevenson67 @chrislammie That looking cheaper aye?
@chrislammie Try our flights man, Edinburgh>stansted>Munich there and back. 200 all in, but steep but cheapest I found
@chrislammie You's are literally next door to us man 😂
@chrislammie Much ye get that for? Up to 200 now. We got one 120 all in for 2 nights, smart stay hotel schiewz. Looks a topper
@chrislammie hotel ye got for Munich?
@chrislammie @KieranClare11 If ye can be arsed with a 5 hour train journey, Edinburgh to Frankfurt and back is 40 all in
@chrislammie @KieranClare11 Tuesday to Thursday both via stansted. Honestly the price jumps were no real, Edinburgh to Prague and back went up 200 in 20 minutes 😳
@chrislammie @KieranClare11 That's the worst I've experienced trying to get flights. £200 each we ended up for Munich 😂😂
That was one of the worst yet for getting flights booked
This is a piss take get them fucking announced
@chrislammie Folk will be jumping the gun, happened last year as well and they changed 😂😂
@chrislammie Folk saying Munich 21st November
No sure whether to believe these fixtures or no
@Jaffa_Miller Do they no mix the pots up depending on the group? Can't mind what happened last year
Somebody best get these fixtures up 😂
@Kyle_Brown95 Nightmare for tickets though
Munich it is then 🙈🙈
Fuck sake 😂😂😂😂😂
We're going to need a bit of luck here or we're absolutely fucked 😂😂
Group E lads, that's what we're after
@adelante34 Benfica, Barca & Liverpool. Fucking certainty 😂
@adelante34 I know man, we're a fucking certainty to get one of the old favourites though 😂
@adelante34 Definitely number 1 on my list
Some buzz for this draw man! Praying for a easy draw with a decent trip thrown in, Roma or Sevilla would be ideal 👌
@Ryanstevenson67 Benfica, Sevilla & Roma for the trips. Spartak Moscow, Porto & Anderlecht for qualifying
Fuming at that! Honestly thought we'd turned a corner away from home in Europe but that was a farce 2nd half. Easiest group possible please
Can barely even celebrate that I'm that fucking raging. Bitton better never ever play at CB again
This is a fucking joke this
We have a spell like that at any point in the group stages and we'll get a tanking. Fucking ridiculous defending and possession of the ball
@Jamie_D94 Decent city, easy to get to and as many tickets as we want. Number 1 on my list
@Jamie_D94 If we end up pot 4, Roma or Spurs. In pot 3 and Dortmund, Real or Benfica. Thinking purely about getting a decent allocation a tickets 😂
Yasssssssss! Sky Scanner at the ready on Thursday lads 😏😏😏
Nothing daft in the first half hour, keep 11 men on the park and we'll cruise it. Should be out looking to beat them anyway
That Terrence Crawford body shot last night 😳👏
That banner in the Celtic end today 👏👏👏
Pure cannot wait to spend 90 minutes singing about Stuart Armstrong the day. Going to be a cracking away day 😏
Not giving a fuck if they'll pump us I want to go to the Bernabau
@CMcDonald0 😂😂😂, I would have been fucking raging cause I never bet it 😳😂. Some night
Don't think I'm coming down till Monday, roll on Killie away on Saturday 🙌🏼🍀
Hands down one of the best European nights I've have at Celtic Park, incredible stuff! Ntcham fucking sensational
@Ryanstevenson67 Just don't see it man
@Ryanstevenson67 No chance is he signing in the next 3 hours when he's in Spain 😂😂
No believing a word Sutton says, Roberts won't sign tonight
Was a bit concerned about a genuine title challenge this year but narrow win against a middle table side with 10 men? Hibs won't trouble us
@danielmurray67 I can go further than that 😂
Well we were utter dug shite tonight, looked like they were going all out to no get injured before Wednesday!
Friday night football 😏😏😏
Absolutely pumped another SPL team with a team of youngsters, future couldn't be brighter! Tierney and Ralston 😍😍
If Paddy doesn't sign now this will be up there with Seville and Black Sunday for biggest disappointments supporting Celtic 😂
@EastonDaz They were awryt, definitely better than last year. Motherwell deserved at least a point though. We'll pump them man honestly 😂
After watching that it's safe to say I'm no worried about any challenge from the Huns this season
@gazmitchell92 It's a decent draw man, be half at work material for the away leg though
Good draw, shite that we're at home first again
That was a pish poor performance from Aberdeen. Why do Scottish teams absolutely shite it in Europe?
Still can't get over how good Jozo Simunovic was last night, what a performance
@drysdale1888 He never put a foot wrong the night, who needs van dijk?
@SimunovicJozo Fucking hero 💚💚💚💚💚
Think the world deserves a Jozo appreciation tweet every day

Legia tifo - fantastic Celtic tifo - keep politics out a football
Only one team is heading for the group stages but 😏😏😏
As much as I hate Legia, that tifo is unreal 👏👏
@Michael_Celtic Fuck up 😳😂
@EastonDaz Aye totally agree man, still didn't stop the nerves arse was making buttons 😂. Qarabag man, avoid Rijeka & Hapoel and I'm happy but
@EastonDaz Fuck knows how 😳😂
Please give us Qarabag 🙏🙏🙏
Party on for us all son 🙌🙌🙌 @DarynPhillips
Jozo Simunovic is a fucking hero, what a performance 😍😍😍
Right, who can we get? Give us Qarabag
And everybody breathe
Take back anything I've ever said about ye Forrest
Yassssssssssssssssssss
Please don't fuck this up Celtic
@ImmyBhoy69 This is fucking torture but 😂
Can barely drink a pint in that nervous 😂
It no 7:45pm yet? Nerves are killing me
@Michael_Celtic Nervous as fuck man. We'll sneak through but it'll be a long 90 minutes
